admin/messages.catalog.download.instruct: 1. Download the data you want to translate from your catalog
2. Open the exported file in Excel or Numbers
3. Translate the following columns in the spreadsheet:
4. After translating, save the file and click Next to continue
admin/messages.catalog.export.something-: Something went wrong. Please try again.
admin/messages.catalog.export.export-beg: Catalog is being exported. Check your email in a few moments.
admin/messages.catalog.export.instructio: 1. Export your product catalog to your email
2. After exporting, open your email and download the attached file
3. Open the exported file in Excel or Numbers
4. Translate the following columns in the spreadsheet:
5. After translating:  save the file and click Next to continue
